companyName: SPDR SSgA Ultra Short Term Bond
description:
The investment seeks to provide current income consistent with preservation of capital and daily liquidity through short duration high quality investments.
 The Adviser invests, under normal circumstances, at least 80% of the fund's net assets (plus the amount of borrowings for investment purposes) in a diversified portfolio of U.S. dollar-denominated investment-grade fixed income securities. The fund may also invest in exchange traded products ("ETPs"). It is non-diversified.
